name: Jinshanling Small Line Trail
description: Try this 6.0-km loop trail near Chengde, Hebei. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 1 h 53 min to complete. This is a popular trail for hiking and walking, but you can still enjoy some solitude during quieter times of day.

name: Mount Xiaowutai
description: Head out on this 29.0-km point-to-point trail near Zhangjiakou Shi, Hebei. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 12 h 54 min to complete. This is a popular trail for backpacking, camping, and hiking, but you can still enjoy some solitude during quieter times of day. The best times to visit this trail are July through July.
